name: Platformer Game (Game Maker factory)
description:
It's A Mini Platformer Game in which you Are A little cube And you Are on A world Tour you will have To prove That The earth is round not flat And it's very short if you enjoyed leave A feedback instructions Are self explanatory but Still 

1) Use The Arrow Keys To move And don't Touch lava or you'll die And press T  To chat # To choose A phrase  And checkpoints Activate when you  Touch Them no more instructions it's very simple + mobile friendly + laptop friendly

I used python to code it And Scratch for The Art & design

hope you like it !  if you do like it Then follow me on Scratch  My Scratch username is @ScratcherCoder12354
